update t_sys_dict
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_sys_dict set type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from t_sys_dict a where a.type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from t_sys_dict a where a.status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} order by sort asc

select
from t_sys_dict a
and a.type like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
and a.status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}
order by a.sort asc
